@nesswaters @MartynReah I've not use with creative writing yet, but I think would use pre, uni, multi for identifying conventions of genre
@nesswaters @MartynReah @globalsolo  The hexagon activities help to make sure there is nothing 'missing' from writing before it's written.
@nesswaters @MartynReah @globalsolo @arti_choke @eggars Written analysis. We've just used them to plan Shakespeare CA.
@MartynReah @nesswaters @globalsolo @arti_choke @eggars Allows for lots of peer &teacher feedback, engaging& kinaesthetic with HUGE hexagons
@MartynReah @nesswaters @globalsolo @arti_choke @eggars Using #SOLO hexagon activities at planning stages makes sure ideas are relational
@MartynReah @nesswaters @globalsolo @arti_choke @eggars Using #SOLO in Eng, KS4. Written responses must be is at least relational for band 3
